Secret module¶

class secret.Secret(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: discord.ext.commands.cog.Cog

Secret commands not loaded by default .. method:: say (ctx, message)

Repeats message (great for trolling (⌐■_■))

ctx (commands.Context) - Context

message (str) - Message to echo
